patthana16.4:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:3.1_1: Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:3.1_2: Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.4:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana16.4:5.1_0: Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:5.1_1: Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:5.1_2: Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:6.1_0: Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:6.1_1: Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:6.1_2: Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:7.1_0: Abyākataṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:7.1_1: Abyākataṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:7.1_2: Abyākataṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.4:8.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
